description: This table contains Electro Surgery Units information for the surgical log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: ELECT_SURG_DEV_ID
columns.description: The ESU device ID.

columns.name: ELCT_SRG_MOD_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The ESU device mode type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Monopolar


Bipolar

columns.name: ELECT_SURG_LOC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The location at which the ESU was applied.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ELECT_SURG_LATER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The laterality of the location.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Left


Right


Bilateral


N/A


Default

columns.name: ESD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The ESU device type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ELECT_SURG_COAG_SE
columns.description: The ESU coagulation settings.

columns.name: ELECT_SURG_CUT_SET
columns.description: The ESU cut settings.

columns.name: ELECT_SURG_BSET_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the blend settings for the Electro Surgery Device.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: ELECT_SURG_COAG_HGH
columns.description: Documents the high coagulation setting of a particular electrosurgical device.

columns.name: ELECT_SURG_CUT_HIGH
columns.description: Documents the high cut setting of a particular electrosurgical device.

columns.name: ELECT_SURG_GPAPP_ID
columns.description: Documents who applied the ESU's grounding pad.

columns.name: ELECT_SURG_PAD_LOT
columns.description: Documents the lot number of the ESU's grounding pad.

columns.name: GROUND_PAD_EXP_DT
columns.description: This item stores the expiration date for an ESU grounding pad.

columns.name: BIPOLAR_SETTING
columns.description: This item stores the bipolar setting for an Electro Surgery Device.  This is the voltage.

columns.name: MONO_CUT_SETTING_C_NAME
columns.description:
The monopolar cut setting category number for the electro surgery unit.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: MONO_COAG_SETTING_C_NAME
columns.description:
The monopolar coagulation setting category number for the electro surgery unit.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: ESU_COAG_WATTAGE
columns.description: Stores information about the wattage for the coagulation setting of the electro surgery unit.

columns.name: ESU_CUT_WATTAGE
columns.description: Stores information about the wattage for the cut setting of the electro surgery unit.

columns.name: ESU_BIPOLAR_WATTAG
columns.description: Stores information about the wattage for the bipolar setting of the electro surgery unit.

columns.name: LIGASURE_ONE_LOW_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the Ligasure 1 Low item. This is usually the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: LIGASURE_ONE_HIGH_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the Ligasure 1 High item. This is usually the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: LIGASURE_TWO_LOW_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the Ligasure 2 Low item. This is usually the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: LIGASURE_TWO_HIGH_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the Ligasure 2 High item. This is usually the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: BIPOLAR_COAG_LOW
columns.description: The low bipolar coagulation setting for the electro surgery unit.

columns.name: BIPOLAR_COAG_HIGH
columns.description: The high bipolar coagulation setting for the electro surgery unit (ESU).

columns.name: BIPOLAR_SETTINGS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the Bipolar Output Settings item.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: GROUND_PAD_SER_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the serial number of the ESU grounding pad.

columns.name: ELECT_SURG_PRESET_C_NAME
columns.description:
Store settings for ESU device.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: ESU_GAS_FLOW_HIGH
columns.description: The high gas flow rate for the electro surgery unit.

columns.name: ESU_GAS_FLOW_LOW
columns.description: The low gas flow rate for the electro surgery unit.

columns.name: ESU_COAG_SETTING
columns.description: Item to document medium setting of ESU machines.

columns.name: ESU_CUT_SETTING
columns.description: Item to document medium cut setting of ESU machines.
